snippet: PARISH--Lawrence J.,86, of Millbrook, NY and Block Island, RI, died on May 11th surrounded by his loved ones. Larry will be remembered for his kindness, sharp wit, and his insatiable desire to learn. He was an avid woodworker, collector of antiques, and a true Renaissance man. Larry graduated from Horace Mann School, Syracuse University and Downstate Medical Center. Some of his best memories were his years in the Air Force as a flight surgeon stationed in Anchorage, AK. Following this, he moved to New York and practiced dermatology for 40 years. Larry grew up in New York, the son of Molly and Mitchell Parish. Mitchell Parish was a lyricist whose songs include "Stardust," "Deep Purple," "Sophisticated Lady," and "Sleigh Ride." Larry is survived by his sister, Ruth, his beloved wife, June, and their children Karen (Ted), Susan, Wendy, Jamie, David and two grandchildren, Max and Jack. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PARISH, LAWRENCE J.
